player_attribute_display.screen.title: Player Attributes
player_attribute_display.client_config.d:
This list contains attributes you want to display on the panel, 13 attributes can be displayed at most.

In each entry, please provide the identifier of the attribute, and configure the decimal place and the number format.

You can optionally add a prefix and a unit. If you want the attribute value to be displayed after a certain calculation, you can also provide a mathematical expression.
player_attribute_display.server_config.d:
This list contains attributes you want to display on the panel.

In each entry, please provide the identifier of the attribute, and configure the decimal place and the number format.

You can optionally add a prefix and a unit. If you want the attribute value to be displayed after a certain calculation, you can also provide a mathematical expression.
player_attribute_display.server_config.u: If turned on, all players will not be able to open the attribute panel.
player_attribute_display.server_config.d:
If turned on, all players will use the server's configuration including:
1. Whether the attribute panel is disabled
2. The attributes to be displayed
player_attribute_display.config.config_d:
If an expression is provided, the attribute value will be calculated before being displayed.

Use x to represent the original value. Substitution is not supported at the moment.
player_attribute_display.message.changed: %s has changed the attribute display configuration. It will be synchronized to all players.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.player_at:
This mod adds a panel that displays a configurable list of attribute values.

To obtain the most accurate values, this mod requires communication between the client and the server, so it must be installed on the server in multi-player.

For more details, please see Github README.
